map.name: Tic Tac K.O.
map.objective: Claim 3 tiles in a row to win!

filter.id: not(any(captured[0]=0, captured[1]=0, captured[2]=0, captured[3]=0, captured[4]=0, captured[5]=0, captured[6]=0, captured[7]=0, captured[8]=0))

message.text: `7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Each round you will face off against the opposing team in an `aepic duel`r!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: The winning team will then `avote `ron which grid space to claim!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: The first team to claim `athree spaces in a row `rwill win the game!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Get ready, `aRound {0} `ris about to begin!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: The arena for this round will be...
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: And the kit you will be using is...
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: May the best team win!

trigger.filter: all(match-running, state=${state_duel}, any(all(x_currently_voting=0, not(o_currently_voting=0)), all(o_currently_voting=0, not(x_currently_voting=0))))

message.text: `7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: `9Crosses `rhave the most players left alive so they win this round!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: `4Naughts `rhave the most players left alive so they win this round!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: The team with the most players alive after `a30 seconds`r will win!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: `9Crosses `rwill now vote on which space on the grid to claim!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: `4Naughts `rwill now vote on which space on the grid to claim!
`7`oFrom `6Tirion`r: Stand on the space which you want to claim. The available space with the most teammates on it will be claimed by your team!
`7[`6Arena Master`7] `6Tirion`r: Oh no! The game has ended in a tie!
